Member Function Documentation

virtual const char* sxsdk::stream_interface::get_label ( void *  = 0  )  const [virtual]

Get The label of the stream.

If set to an object, a label is appended to the right of the object's name. Unlike the object name, it cannot be deleted by modifying the name. Label are recommended to differentiate objects with different attributes.

virtual bool sxsdk::stream_interface::get_swap_endian ( void *  aux = 0  )  [virtual]

convert the endian or not

If true, convert the endian

virtual stream_interface& sxsdk::stream_interface::operator<< ( const float &  f  )  [virtual]

Writes a float to the stream.

The pointer advances 4 bytes.

Writes a C string to the stream.

The pointer advances a number of bytes equal to the C string size.

virtual stream_interface& sxsdk::stream_interface::operator>> ( float &  f  )  [virtual]

Reads a float from the stream.

The pointer advances 4 bytes. An exception is thrown if EOF.

virtual stream_interface& sxsdk::stream_interface::set_label ( const char *  label_param,
void *  = 0 
) [virtual]

Set The label of the stream.

If set to an object, a label is appended to the right of the object's name. Unlike the object name, it cannot be deleted by modifying the name. Label are recommended to differentiate objects with different attributes.
